column1: pdf printable version facts. born: september 20, 1964. place of birth: haywood county, ncdeath: june 18, 2015. place of death: henderson county, ncsurvivors. michael miller, son. margaret gilliland, motherj. v. miller, father. jeff miller & wayne miller, brothers. servicesgraveside service. tuesday june 23, 2015, 2 pm at mill pond cemetery the family will receive friends from 12 - 1:30 pm at shuler funeral home. mill pond cemetery is at the intersection of south rugby and 191. donations. memorial donations may be made to:www. gofundme. com/jim. millermemorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
